meta.title: store/order/updated - Models - Webhooks - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
This webhook fires when an already created order is updated.  

Fields that trigger event: Product TypeSearch KeywordsRelated ProductsWarranty Informati...

blocks.data:
This webhook fires when an already created order is updated. Fields that trigger event:
  • Product Type
  • Search Keywords
  • Related Products
  • Warranty Information
  • Page Title
  • Meta Description
  • Gift Wrapping options
  • Bin Picking Number (BPN)
  • Fixed Shipping Price
  • Free Shipping
  • Open Graph Sharing Type
  • Availability Text
  • Purchasability
  • Release Date
  • Remove pre-order status on this date
### Example callback: ```json { "created_at": 1561482670, "store_id": "1025646", "producer": "stores/{store_hash}", "scope": "store/order/updated", "hash": "352e4afc6dd3fc85ea26bfdf3f91852604d57528", "data": { "type": "order", "id": 250 } } ``` ### Callback schema:

created_at.description: Hook creation date as a Unix timestamp.

store_id.description: A numerical identifier that is unique to each store.

producer.description: Will always follow the pattern `stores/store_hash`. This is the store that created the webhook.

scope.description: The event registered when the webhook was created.

hash.description: The payload data JSON encoded then passed through SH1 encryption.

allOf.description: A lightweight description of the event that triggered the webhook. Will vary depending on the event registered.

data.description: A lightweight description of the event that triggered the webhook. Will vary depending on the event registered.
